verses.name: 2 Corinthians 3:1
verses.text: Do we begin again to commend ourselves? or need we, as some others, epistles of commendation to you, or letters of commendation from you?

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 3:2
verses.text: Ye are our epistle written in our hearts, known and read of all men:

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 3:3
verses.text: Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared to be the epistle of Christ ministered by us, written not with ink, but with the Spirit of the living God; not in tables of stone, but in fleshy tables of the heart.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 3:4
verses.text: And such trust have we through Christ to God-ward:
